ttp_template:
<group name="interface_interface_role_label_advertisement_mode_ldp">
  MTU: {{MTU | ORPHRASE}}
  Label Distribution Protocol: {{LDP | ORPHRASE}}
  Label Advertisement Mode: {{LABEL_ADVERTISEMENT_MODE | ORPHRASE}}
Interface: {{INTERFACE | ORPHRASE}}
  MPLS Status: {{MPLS_STATUS | ORPHRASE}}
  Interface Role: {{INTERFACE_ROLE | ORPHRASE}}
</group>
cli_content:
Interface: Ethernet1/1
  MPLS Status: Enabled
  MTU: 1500
  Label Distribution Protocol: LDP
  Label Advertisement Mode: Downstream Unsolicited
  Interface Role: Provider Edge

Interface: Ethernet1/2
  MPLS Status: Enabled
  MTU: 1500
  Label Distribution Protocol: TDP
  Label Advertisement Mode: Downstream On Demand
  Interface Role: Core

Interface: Ethernet1/3
  MPLS Status: Disabled
  MTU: 1500
  Label Distribution Protocol: LDP
  Label Advertisement Mode: Downstream On Demand
  Interface Role: Access
textfsm_template:
Value INTERFACE (\S+)
Value MPLS_STATUS (\S+)
Value MTU (\d+)
Value LDP (\S+)
Value LABEL_ADVERTISEMENT_MODE (.+)
Value INTERFACE_ROLE (\S+)

Start
  ^Interface:\s+${INTERFACE}\s*$$
  ^\s*MPLS Status:\s+${MPLS_STATUS}\s*$$
  ^\s*MTU:\s+${MTU}\s*$$
  ^\s*Label Distribution Protocol:\s+${LDP}\s*$$
  ^\s*Label Advertisement Mode:\s+${LABEL_ADVERTISEMENT_MODE}\s*$$
  ^\s*Interface Role:\s+${INTERFACE_ROLE}\s*$$ -> Record
